类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: X-LargeColor: Black
评论详情: I am 6'0 230 lbs with very large calves. Finding joggers that fit both my lower legs and waist is the world's most complicated task. These 4-way stretch golf joggers are the first joggers that fit my body type great, while also being extremely comfortable and durable. I ordered the XL with the 30 inch inseam. The length is perfect as well. The material offers the perfect amount of thickness and stretch, and does not feel cheap at all. I've put them through about 3-4 washes already and they quality remains the same. The quality of these joggers make them an absolute steal at the price they're sold for. In my opinion, CRZ yoga joggers are almost/just as good as more expensive luxury brands for a great price.

类型: Fit Type: 32 inchesSize: X-LargeColor: Khali Barley
评论详情: The quality feels nice and they are just thick enough for some warmth. The are fitting to your legs, and not too baggy. They are great for showing off your legs. I’m 6’6, and these are perfect.

类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: MediumColor: Black

He doesn’t say much about clothes but actually commented he loves them and seeing him wear them everyday conformed it. I actually ordered another pair in case they sold out his size. Coincidentally my husband said “oh those look nice” so I ordered him a pair…he immediately loved them and said “I wouldn’t mind having a few more pairs!” FYI he has a bunch of “travel /athletic” pants from bike, Banana republic, Dicks, and target. These are by far the best. Obviously never tried Lululemon because I haven’t been able to justify spending $100 on one pair but I would imagine they are similar. Very happy both my guys love them and usually don’t say much about clothes unless they are really bad or really good.

类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: MediumColor: Black

类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: MediumColor: Cliff Ash
评论详情: I’m a little of a brand wh*re and took a risk on these. I’m insistent on zip pockets. These joggers are really great. Feel good, good stretch, good color selections. They’re sensitive and a little on the cheap end. I’d be more than willing to pay more for a quality bump. These are lightweight very comfortable joggers you can’t go wrong with.

类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: MediumColor: Electric Blue
评论详情: Absolutely amazing pants. Have had them for almost two years now and wear them weekly, some weeks daily. They still look like new and the material feels amazing, you can wear them anywhere! 类型: Fit Type: 32 inchesSize: LargeColor: Ink Gray
评论详情: Great pair of joggers for a long legged fella. My only criticism is there is no back pocket. These are labeled “golf”, but there’s no back pocket to put your glove in. I wear these every week (I have 3 pair) for work in a PT clinic. They’re super flexible to allow for all sorts of dynamic movements. I wear these more often than my lulu joggers, and at around a third of the cost. All the zippers work smoothly and the elastic has held up to 50+ washes without starting to sag. Safe to say I’ll get more IF these ever wear out. Oh yeah, they hold up to fading as well. Many days in hostile NC sun playing golf and cycles through the washing machine and they all maintain their color.

评论详情: These joggers look great in any setting. They are some of the most comfortable joggers I have owned and they are just stretchy enough to be comfortable but not to the point that they don’t have structure. For me the only down side is the length is a little long for my liking

类型: Fit Type: 30 inchesSize: LargeColor: Black
评论详情: I absolutely love my Lululemon ABC Jogger. I have two pair. I want to buy a third but don't want to pay $128+tax. After researching, I found the Crazy Yoga golf jogger. PROS: Similar stretchy, comfy, wicking fabric. True to fit. I'm 6'1" and 210 lbs. and a large 30" inseam fits well. Shallow but zippered front pockets, helpful to hold keys and other objects. Zipper cuff, making it easier to don and doff. Also, if you don't like it snug around the ankle. 1/4 the price of Lulus. CONS: A little tighter on the leg than my Lulus, taking away from comfort. Small, scrunchy cuff at the bottom instead of the nice cuffs on the Lulus. No back pocket. However, all-in-all, a nice alternative to Lululemon ABC Warpstreme joggers at a fraction of the price. Can't yet speak to the durability because I just got them.

类型: Fit Type: 32 inchesSize: MediumColor: Melanite
评论详情: I love CRZ Yoga pants.  I have multiple pairs of the 5-pocket pants and a few pairs of these joggers.The material is smooth, it has a nice stretch to it, and it's thick which is great for wearing them anywhere other than the gym (although they still make great gym pants).  Can easily dress these up or down and the colors do not fade after washing.They do run a bit large...I am 6'1" and 200lbs.  I bought a size large and returned them because they were too baggy.
